tooltip.infinity_nexus_core.linking_tool:
§aShift+Click on destination inventory to copy coordinates.
§bRename this item using the example below with the destination coordinates of the items (action radius: 100 blocks).

§cw=0,§ex=30,y=80,z=-77,face=up
 §bAllowed sides:

north, south, east, west, up, down.
item.infinity_nexus_core.strength_descri: This upgrade decreases the energy cost of your machine.
item.infinity_nexus_core.speed_descripti: This upgrade increases the speed of your machine.
item.infinity_nexus_core.muffler_descrip: This upgrade decreases the sound of your machine.
item.infinity_nexus_core.pusher_descript: This upgrade eject items from your machine up.
tooltip.infinity_nexus_core.component_in: Right-click on a machine to install this level component.
tooltip.infinity_nexus_core.upgrade_inst: Right-click on a machine to install this upgrade.
